import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { User } from '../model/User'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/User.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'] }) export class ProfileComponent { id!:number user!:User constructor(private Act : ActivatedRoute,private service: UserService) {} ngOnInit(){ this.id = this.Act.snapshot.params['id']; this.service.getUserById(this.id).subscribe( { next: (data:any)=>this.user=data, error: (err) => console.log(err), complete: () => console.log('done') }); // console.log(this.id); } } User Profile

{{user.nomUtilisateur}} {{user.prenomUtilisateur}}

Contact Information

Email: {{user.email}}

Phone: {{user.numTel}}
